main event: A white circular object emitting a steady, uniform white light was observed at a low altitude near Coleville, Arkansas, on September 26, 1965.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 40-50 feet in diameter and hovering at an altitude of 1,000-1,500 feet., The object made no noise during the sighting., The object abruptly disappeared as the witness approached the area., This sighting occurred around 7:30 to 7:45 P.M., CST., There were various observations and reports of the comet Ikeya-Seki during this time period.
witness description: A witness reported seeing the object while approaching the scene.
